sentences.en: But it is not hindsight alone that finds a natural, not solely a supernatural, sequentiality here.
sentences.cn: 但是在这里发现一种自然的(不单单是超自然的)顺序性, 并非仅仅事后聪明.

sentences.en: Even with the benefit of hindsight, I doubt I would change anything if I had my time again.
sentences.cn: 就算是事后已经一切明了，如果让我重来一次，我也不确定自己是否会作出改变。

sentences.en: Hindsight shows us the 1990 World Cup Semi - Final was a heroic defeat.
sentences.cn: 事后的所有迹象向我们表明,1990年的世界杯 半决赛 上演过一场壮烈的牺牲.

sentences.en: However, hindsight is easier than foresight.
sentences.cn: 然而, 后知总是比先见容易.

sentences.en: I now know with hindsight that I did him a terrible wrong.
sentences.cn: 我事后才明白我完全冤枉了他.

sentences.en: I opposed this at the time, but with hindsight it was a sensible economy.
sentences.cn: 我当时表示反对, 不过事后一想,这是切合实际的节约措施.

sentences.en: I was able to a judgment with the benefit of hindsight.
sentences.cn: 我借助事后的认识才得以作出“判断”.

sentences.en: I was able to attempt a judgment with the benefit of hindsight.
sentences.cn: 我借助事后的认识才得以作出判断.

sentences.en: In hindsight the most important advance was made by Heesch, who developed the method of discharging.
sentences.cn: 在后来的研究中认识到,最重大的进展是Heesch作出的, 他发展了一种排除法.

sentences.en: In hindsight, it appears that her birth was an uneventful one.
sentences.cn: 之后的迹象表明, 她的出生似乎平淡无奇.

sentences.en: Usually , historical eras are defined by accomplishments analyzed with the benefit of contextua 1 hindsight.
sentences.cn: 如何定义具有重在历史意义的时代呢?这取于这时代中所取得的成就对历史语境的事后影响.

sentences.en: We failed, and with ( the benefit of ) hindsight I now see where we went wrong.
sentences.cn: 我们失利了, 事后一想,我终于明白了错在哪里.

sentences.en: With hindsight, he was overestimating their desire for peace.
sentences.cn: 事后看来，他高估了他们对和平的渴望。

sentences.en: With hindsight, we'd all do things differently.
sentences.cn: 有了事后的认识，我们都会以不同的方式行事。

sentences.en: With the benefit of hindsight, it is clear we ought to have done more.
sentences.cn: 事后看来，我们显然本该做得更多。

trans.tran_cn: 后见之明，（步枪的）照尺，表尺
trans.tran_en: Hindsight is the ability to understand and realize something about an event after it has happened, although you did not understand or realize it at the time
